CVXPY
Maximize
  Sum(x, None, False)
Subject To
 43: reshape(x + [1. 1. 1. 1.], (2, 2), F) <= [[1.00 1.00]
 [1.00 1.00]]
Bounds
 x free
End
----------------------------------------
AFTER COMPILATION
Minimize
 Obj: -1 x_0 -1 x_1 -1 x_2 -1 x_3
Subject to
 c1: +1 x_0 <= +0
 c2: +1 x_1 <= +0
 c3: +1 x_2 <= +0
 c4: +1 x_3 <= +0
Bounds
 x_0 free
 x_1 free
 x_2 free
 x_3 free
End
----------------------------------------
SCIP
Maximize
 Obj: +1 x_0 +1 x_1 +1 x_2 +1 x_3
Subject to
 43_0_0: +1 x_0 <= +0
 43_0_1: +1 x_1 <= +0
 43_1_0: +1 x_2 <= +0
 43_1_1: +1 x_3 <= +0
Bounds
 x_0 free
 x_1 free
 x_2 free
 x_3 free
End
